transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from a sender to a recipient.

transferAndCall.description: Transfers tokens to a recipient and triggers a callback.

approve.description: Approves a spender to transfer tokens on behalf of the owner.

decreaseApproval.description: Decreases the approval of a spender.

increaseApproval.description: Increases the approval of a spender.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of an account.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used by the token.

Approval.description: Emits when a spender is approved for a transfer.
